tool.name: sort otu table
tool.description: Script for sorting the sample IDs in an OTU table based on a specified value in a mapping file.
tool.command:
sort_otu_table.py -i $input_otu_table -o $output_fp #if str($mapping_fp) != 'None': -m $mapping_fp #end if
#if str($sort_field): -s $sort_field #end if
#if str($sorted_sample_ids_fp) != 'None': -l $sorted_sample_ids_fp #end if

param.label: -i/--input_otu_table: Input OTU table filepath in BIOM format.
param.name: input_otu_table

param.label: -s/--sort_field: Category to sort OTU table by. [default: None]
param.name: sort_field
